string-array.name: standardGOM
string-array.item: You failed. Now you can try again or give up.

string-array.name: GOMReputation
string-array.item: Everybody in the whole world hates you and you decide to kill yourself.

string-array.name: GOMGrade
string-array.item: You got kicked out of school and now this game has no reason to go on.

string-array.name: GOMParents
string-array.item: You disappointed your parents so much that they hated you and kicked out of your home. Now you live on the street. Congrats.

string-array.name: GOMMoney
string-array.item: You have no Money to buy food. So you slowly starve to death.
